overview: In a series of rape and murder cases, detective Kiba, who attended the on-site inspection, decides that the culprit is a woman. But there is no basis and it is a simple feeling. The boss's restraint is rejected and Kiba's arbitrary investigation begins. Even Kiba like this had a woman he admired. This is Keiko, the younger sister of senior detective Tori. Kiba, who tries to keep her chastity until her marriage, goes on a date with Keiko while he is busy training his genitals. By this time, Naomi, who reigned as the queen of her lesbian world, was producing her own sex slaves with her expert technique. Relentlessly abandoning her existing slaves every time she gets a new one, Naomi ends up reaching out to her Kiba's lover Keiko as well...
title: Yakuza Criminal
